languages.text: "Белое, белое... ясный, чистый цвет — и тот весь пронизан мерзкими венами, что разносят по телу яд страха и боли. Кто ты? О чем ты плачешь?"
"White, white... bright, pure colour — and it's all riddled with horrible veins that carry the poison of fear and pain throughout its body. Who are you? Why are you crying?"
languages.original_text: "Белое, белое... ясный, чистый цвет — и тот весь пронизан мерзкими венами, что разносят по телу яд страха и боли. Кто ты? О чем ты плачешь?"

languages.text: “白色，白色……明亮、纯洁的颜色，但它全身上下，布满了可怕的血管，把恐惧与痛苦的毒液运往它的全身。你是什么人？你为什么要哭泣？”
languages.original_text: "White, white... bright, pure colour — and it's all riddled with horrible veins that carry the poison of fear and pain throughout its body. Who are you? Why are you crying?"

traits.locale_text: “白色，白色……明亮、纯洁的颜色，但它全身上下，布满了可怕的血管，把恐惧与痛苦的毒液运往它的全身。你是什么人？你为什么要哭泣？”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Blanco, blanco... un color puro y brillante... lleno de venas horribles que llevan el veneno del miedo y el dolor por su cuerpo. ¿Quién eres? ¿Por qué lloras?».
languages.original_text: "White, white... bright, pure colour — and it's all riddled with horrible veins that carry the poison of fear and pain throughout its body. Who are you? Why are you crying?"

traits.locale_text: «Blanco, blanco... un color puro y brillante... lleno de venas horribles que llevan el veneno del miedo y el dolor por su cuerpo. ¿Quién eres? ¿Por qué lloras?».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「白、白…明るく、純粋な色…そして、恐怖と苦痛の毒を全身に巡らせる、恐ろしい血管が張り巡らされている。あなたは誰？なぜ泣いている？」
languages.original_text: "White, white... bright, pure colour — and it's all riddled with horrible veins that carry the poison of fear and pain throughout its body. Who are you? Why are you crying?"

traits.locale_text: 「白、白…明るく、純粋な色…そして、恐怖と苦痛の毒を全身に巡らせる、恐ろしい血管が張り巡らされている。あなたは誰？なぜ泣いている？」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Weiß, weiß ... helle, reine Farbe ... und überall schreckliche Adern, die das Gift von Furcht und Schmerz durch seinen Leib befördern. Wer seid Ihr? Warum weint Ihr?"
languages.original_text: "White, white... bright, pure colour — and it's all riddled with horrible veins that carry the poison of fear and pain throughout its body. Who are you? Why are you crying?"

traits.locale_text: "Weiß, weiß ... helle, reine Farbe ... und überall schreckliche Adern, die das Gift von Furcht und Schmerz durch seinen Leib befördern. Wer seid Ihr? Warum weint Ihr?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Blanc, blanc... Une couleur pure, éblouissante... et criblée de veines ignobles qui diffusent la peur et la souffrance dans tout son corps. Qui êtes-vous ? Pourquoi pleurez-vous ? »
languages.original_text: "White, white... bright, pure colour — and it's all riddled with horrible veins that carry the poison of fear and pain throughout its body. Who are you? Why are you crying?"

traits.locale_text: « Blanc, blanc... Une couleur pure, éblouissante... et criblée de veines ignobles qui diffusent la peur et la souffrance dans tout son corps. Qui êtes-vous ? Pourquoi pleurez-vous ? »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Beyaz, beyaz... Parlak, saf bir renk... Tüm vücuda korku ve acının zehrini taşıyan korkunç damarlarla sarılmış. Sen kimsin? Neden ağlıyorsun?"
languages.original_text: "White, white... bright, pure colour — and it's all riddled with horrible veins that carry the poison of fear and pain throughout its body. Who are you? Why are you crying?"
